---
name: User Story
about: Identifies the target user or stakeholder for whom the feature or functionality
  is being designed. It ensures clarity about who benefits from the requirement.
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]  
   
### Details and Assumptions
* [document what you know]
   
### Acceptance Criteria  
   
```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [the outcome of action is observed]
```
